    Docstrings
    Notifier.Notifier
    Notifier.alarm — Function.
    Notifier.alarm(;sound="default.wav")

    Notify by sound. If you choose a specific sound WAV file, you can play it instead of the default sound.

    Notifier.email — Function.
    Notifier.email(message; subject, To)

    Send email to specific email address.

    Arguments

    • To::AbstractString: recipient email adress.
    Notifier.eval
    Notifier.include
    Base.notify — Function.
    Notifier.notify(message; title="Julia", sound=false, time=4, logo)

    Notify by desktop notification.

    Arguments

    • sound::Union{Bool, AbstractString}: Play default sound or specific sound.
    • time::Real: display time.
    • logo: Default is Julia logo
